View Up/Down: Cycle Lock - In View - Under Reticle
Cycle Lock - Sub-Target - Reset to Main Target
Decoy - Launch Burst (tap), Set and Launch Burst (hold)
Cycle Gimbal Assist / Standard Gimbal / Gimbal Lock modes
Cycle Lock - All - Reset to Closest
Cycle Lock - Attackers - Reset to Closest
Cycle Lock - Hostiles - Reset to Closest
